extendedInfo.description: Get ready for the party with this live wallpaper. Interactive launching of rockets with your tap on the screen, or configure the autolauncher to do the firework for you!* 4 different kinds of rockets with an endless variation variety* State-of-the-art particle systems for realistic fireworks feeling* Not more cpu usage than the standard nexus s wallpaper* Configurable to whatever you like* Free Version, just have fun and enjoyKeywords: New Years Eve, Silvester, Fireworks, cracker, party, live wallpaper, happy new year, joyful, hd, New Year 2012, custom, widgets

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Trails quite thick but overall nice.  Like the way fireworks launch at your fingertips and no special permissions required!!
reviews.author: A Google User
